Translations.Text: DEUS proclaimed NON worship 2 DEUS ibi est UNUS UNUS DEUS! Vos reverence Me alone
Eum belongs everything caelum terra ergo religionis devoted absolutely Eum alone Vos worship DEUS
Any beatus vos enjoy est DEUS. autem whenever vos incur any adversity vos statim complain Eum
prout soon prout He relieves tuus affliction some de vos revert idol worship
Let them disbelieve quod nos dedit them! Iit ahead enjoy ex; temporanea; vos perfecit surely invenit out
They designate idols they set ignorance share provisions nos bestow them. De DEUS vos habuit accountable pro tuus innovations
They et assign filia DEUS He glorified dum they prefer themselves quod they like
When unus de them gets baby puella his face becomes darkened overwhelming grief
Ashamed he hides people malus news dedit eum. He et ponders should he keep baby grudgingly bury eam in dust Miserable indeed est their judgment
Those non believe in Hereafter set malus examples dum to DEUS belongs the multus sublime examples! He est Almighty the Multus Wise
